entry.title: Derby Originals Reflective Safety No Hardware Foal & Mini Horse Winter Stable Blanket 420D Medium Weight 150g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets
Price: 37.99 - 42.99 (6 variants)

Derby Originals Reflective Safety Winter Blanket for Foals are a better and more modern solution to outdated foal blanket designs. Our foal blankets feature a pair of adjustable double-velcro chest straps that allow for the blanket to be adjusted to fit smaller or larger foals. These chest straps are elastic to allow for a more comfortable and snug fit, which helps keep your foal safe and from becoming tangled. This blanket also features matching elastic double-velcro belly straps for the best possible fit. All four chest and belly straps are covered in reflective tape to greatly increase visibility and help keep your foal safe outside or in the pasture. We're proud to be the original inventor of the hardware free foal blanket, which has no metal parts to increase your foal's comfort and safety. Our innovative blanket also has a pair of adjust-to-fit neck-straps to allow for a better fit around the neck opening. Our blankets come with an oversized tail cover that is held in place with 3 sturdy velcro tabs and can be removed and replaced as needed. Our blankets are made of 420D water-resistant, windproof, breathable nylon, which is designed for premium comfort indoors. This blanket has 150 grams of PolyFil filling, which is designed to keep your foal warm without overheating in temperatures down to 10Â° F. This blanket is available in three fun colors so you can find the perfect blanket to best suit your new foal: Coral, Charcoal, and Hurricane Blue.


  • DESIGNED TO GROW WITH YOUR FOAL - our safety blankets have adjustable straps and elastic on the chest and belly straps to allow for the best fit possible. Our blankets can adjust by 6" so they fit your foal for longer and can fit multiple foals.
  • NO HARDWARE DESIGN KEEPS YOUR FOAL SAFE - this blanket is metal-free for increased safety. This, combined with other features such as a reflective design, adjustable neck straps, and a padded belly band, increases both your foal's safety and comfort.
  • AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES - our foal blankets are available in three sizes to fit most Small, Medium, and Large foals. Size Small is recommended for most newborn foals. Sizes Medium and Large will also fit most mini horses as well as larger foals.
  • SIZING RECOMMENDATIONS FOR MINIS - Please note that the back length and belly straps are shorter as these blankets are meant to fit foals. We do not recommend the size Small for any mini horse, only sizes Medium and Large, and recommend sizing up.
  • DESIGNED FOR INDOOR USE - our foal blankets are made from a 420D material that is designed to keep your foal comfortable indoors by being breathable and comfortable to wear. This allows your foal to stay warm without becoming overheated.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic Tough Closed Front 420D Water Resistant Reflective Winter Horse Stable Blanket 200g Medium Weight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (22 variants)

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made of durable and high-quality materials.
  • INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our new Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series boasts new premium features such as padded belly bands, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, and more.
  • DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM INDOOR COMFORT - this premium stable blanket was designed to be warm, draft and wind-resistant, breathable, water-resistant, and comfortable to wear no matter how long your horse is blanketed indoors.
  • WARMING TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 200g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a soft 420D nylon exterior that is breathable and water-resistant.
  • SAFETY CLOSED-FRONT DESIGN - this blanket was designed with a closed chest that has no hardware in order to protect your horse and prevent injury. This, combined with our padded belly band closure, promotes both comfort and safety.

entry.title: Derby Originals Wind Storm West Coast 420D Medium Weight Water Resistant Mini Horse Pony Winter Stable Blanket 200g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets
Price: 49.99 - 64.99 (45 variants)

Derby Originalsâ latest line of ultra-premium winter blankets, the Windstorm Series, was designed to offer a myriad of blanket options in material, weight, and design for equines of all sizes. This comprehensive line features stable and turnout blankets and sheets available in a plethora of beautiful, modern colors in every size from 36â all the way up to rare 100â large draft horse sizing. These blankets are not only beautiful but designed to be hardy and long-lasting with even the most destructive horses.

Â 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium stable blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This indoor blanket is made from high quality materials.

OPEN FRONT DESIGN - this blanket features a pair of quick-clip adjustable buckles on the chest that make this blanket easy and convenient to take on and off. This adjustable chest design also allows this blanket to better fit your horse.

DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM INDOOR COMFORT - this premium stable blanket was designed to be warm, draft and wind-resistant, breathable, water-resistant, and comfortable to wear no matter how long your horse is blanketed indoors.

REINFORCED SURCINGLE AND LEG STRAPS - this blanket features sturdy and attractive leather reinforcements around the belly surcingles and leg straps to prevent excess wear.

ADJUST TO FIT NECK - this blanket features an adjustable neck strap on either side so that you can make sure your blanket fits snugly and comfortably on your horse, and prevent rain or snow from getting under the blanket.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Sizing Information: to size this blanket, measure (in inches) from the center of your horseâs chest, to the end of your horseâs rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

entry.title: Derby Originals 1200D Breathable Nylon Closed Front Heavyweight Horse Stable Blanket with Two Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets

Our 1200D Breathable Nylon Closed Front Heavyweight Horse Stable Blanket is a comfortable stable blanket solution for horses who bite at or chew on or can undo front chest buckles. This blanket easily slips over your horseâs head and fastens with an extra wide, comfortable, padded belly band. This blanket was designed to be extra warm and has 300g of Polyfil inside. This blanket is great for indoor use, or for use as an extra warm underlayment under a waterproof turnout sheet or blanket for outdoor use.

  • DESIGNED FOR INDOOR USE - this stable blanket was specially designed to meet your horseâs indoor needs by being exceptionally warming, highly breathable for maximum comfort, and having a soft, moisture-wicking no-rub 210T nylon lining.
  • KEEP YOUR HORSE WARM IN ANY WEATHER - this blanket was designed to keep your horse warm even in below zero weather thanks to its heavyweight 300g of Polyfil.
  • CLOSED FRONT DESIGN - this blanket features a closed chest design which slips over your horseâs head, and is perfect for horses who like to bite or grab at chest buckles or can undo them.

These cotton sheets are even perfect for other equines such as mules and donkeys!

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSEâS COMFORT IN MIND - this summer sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear long-term and is designed to keep your horse warm in cool weather without overheating.
  • HELPS KEEP YOUR HORSE CLEAN - this sheet is lightweight and excellent to use in any season to keep your horse clean before a show or event, or use to help dry your horse and keep them comfortable after a bath.
  • PROTECTS AGAINST PESTS - this sheet is great for use as a flu sheet as it helps to keep your horseâs body protected from biting pests such as mosquitoes, flies, and gnats that would otherwise cause sores and irritation.
  • CLASSICAL DESIGN WITH PREMIUM FEATURES - this summer sheet features classic designs with a shoulder gusset, front chest buckles, crossed belly surcingles, removable elastic leg straps, and a fleece wither protector.
  • GREAT AS A BLANKET UNDERLAYMENT - this sheet is excellent for use during cold weather as an extra layer beneath blankets to help keep your horse warm inside the barn, or in the pasture on chilly days.

Sizing Information:

This sheet is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horseâs chest, to the end of your horseâs rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

Blanket Care:

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Product Information

Blanket Style: Summer Sheet

Waterproof: No

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Lightweight

Material: Cotton

Denier: n/a

Ripstop: No

Tail Cover: No

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfil: 0g

Inner Lining: Cotton

Belly Closure: Belly Surgincle

Leg Straps: Removable Elastic

Colors Available: Hunter Green/Beige Plaid

Sizes Available: 72â, 74â, 76â, 78â, 80â, 82â, and 84â

entry.title: Derby Originals Fleece Cooler for Horses All Season Sheet & Blanket Liner with Crossed Surcingles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fleece Sheets & Blanket Liners
Price: 34.99

Â 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSEâS COMFORT IN MIND - this fleece sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear long-term and is designed to keep your horse warm in cool weather without overheating.

SOFT FLEECE CONSTRUCTION - this fleece blanket is made with a layer of plush and soft polar fleece, which provides warmth and protection against the cold while also wicking away moisture for comfort.

GREAT FOR DRYING OFF YOUR HORSE - If your horse is wet after a bath or sweaty after a ride or workout, our coolers are ideal for drying off without overheating thanks to their ultra moisture-wicking polar fleece design.

DESIGNED FOR INDOOR USE - our fleece coolers/blanket liners were designed for indoor use but can be used outdoors in mild weather or under a waterproof sheet/blanket as a warming layer in colder or wet weather.

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS AND SIZES - these fleece coolers are available in sizes 69â-84â and in the colors Navy Blue and Hunter Green. The model pictured is a 14.3hh Paso Fino named Tessa who wears size 69â.

Derby Originals Fleece Cooler for Horses All Season Sheet & Blanket Liner with Crossed Surcingles is an excellent and affordable option for the horse owner looking for a lightweight, breathable, moisture-wicking, and comfortable sheet that is ideal in all seasons and extremely versatile. These coolers/blanket liners are ideal for many applications such as: using after a bath or hard ride to absorb excess water/sweat and dry your horse off without the risk of overheating, using in cool or fluctuating weather to keep your horse warm without overheating, putting on your horse before a show to keep their coat clean, or using as an underlayer beneath another blanket to provide extra warmth during cold weather.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Â
